name: An opulent golden headdress
data: It decreases the users strength pitifully.
It increases the users constitution pitifully.
It increases the users wisdom a good amount.
It increases the users charisma a bit.
It has pathetic armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration an average amount.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users magical resistance adequately.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'flow of life'.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'healing efficiency'.
The headdress quickens and sharpens the mind of the wearer.
